title: Reservation Form
note: Please submit your reservation detail & We will contact you to confirm your booking

infos.title: Reserve by Phone
infos.text: We take reservations for lunch and dinner. To make a reservation, please call us at (080)-1234-678 between 09am-7pm, Monday to Friday.

infos.title: Private Parties & Events
infos.text: We are honored to serve you a special day, great in your life such as birthday parties, weddings, conferences or meeting friends. If the size of the party, the event over 15 wheels, please let us know soon.
